account.descriptionLink:
Each team works to trade their portfolio over one month, using their collective knowledge, strategies, and learnings from the dynamic world of memecoins.

The competition focuses on market analysis, decision-making, and risk management, fostering a deeper understanding of the crypto market dynamics. The educational component of this activation ultimately promotes informed investing and deeper understanding of blockchain technology, leading to more sustainable growth / innovation.

account.descriptionLink:
As a part of the Decentralization effort for BONK - we are allocating resources for the BONK COmmunity Fund via the Align Protocol.

This fund will initally consist of 500,000,000,000 (500 Billion) BONK, and be used to promote community ideas, grassroot projects, and further implementations of the BONK Token. After it's  been utilized, the BONK DAO can decide to fund it further or continue with extra efforts. The approximate timeline for the funding is through the end of Q2 and start of Q3.

Funds will be sent to the Genesis wallet of BONK and then into the Align protocol

account.descriptionLink:
TL;DR Ycombinator for SOL

BonkDAO is proposing a $500,000.00 investment into the first round as an LP of this accelerator fund. Helping to support builders in the ecosystem and diversify the DAO treasury across early stage builders and founders via equity. 

Approval of this proposal will trigger the movement of 45B Bonk to an independent wallet which will complete an OTC for USDC. Any access Bonk will be sent back to DAO treasury.
account.name: Colosseum LP - Colosseum will run Solana Foundation hackathons going forward as an independent organization

account.descriptionLink:
With the recent increase in BONK's individual token price, a proposal now costs significantly more than when the BONKDAO was created earlier this year. While we are not making decisions based on the Token's price itself, it has gotten to the point where 1 Billion BONK to create a proposal is prohibitive to the general community engaging with BONKDAO

Lowering the requirements to create a proposal, without lowering the voting requirements for Quorum overall, will allow the creation of new proposals by community members without the barrier to entry.
account.name: Update Realms Config for "Bonk DAO"

account.descriptionLink: In order to sure up the revenue fees sent to the BONK DAO treasury from BONKBot, 99233668081.5B will be sent to the designated BONKBot wallet from the main treasury wallet. This separate wallet was created February 6th and the 99233668081.5B represents the fees generated and sent to the DAO prior to that time. All future fees will be sent to the designated BONKBot wallet.
account.name: BONKbot Wallet Accounting

An upcoming partnership will result in 20,000 new users each being rewarded with 30,000,000 BONK. This totals 600,000,000,000 BONK Tokens. The purpose of this is rewarding people for a specific action, and relates to ways we are working to push Solana forward with a partner Organization. J.T. Liss is a digital collage artist, CEO of a NYC arts education company, and founder of the Arts Ambassador Grant program supported by The Solana Foundation.

PenguLove is a digital art collective founded by Kadense. They’ve supported the arts on Solana since 2021, using their treasury to make weekly purchases from Solana creators.

They are requesting Solana

account.descriptionLink:
Chomp is a trivia/quiz game allowing for detailed insights. It’s the first product by Gator Labs. 

Using BONK as Chomp’s in-game token creates utility for BONK, opportunities to burn BONK, while bringing a gamified experience and valuable insights to the ecosystem. 

In the long run, Gator plans to build the first robust reputation system and information validation network on Solana. Bonk’s support in our first product would also be a major step toward building a key piece of on-chain infrastructure.

-Integration with live data feeds

account.descriptionLink: BONK DAO six month contract with Glyn Jones to advise and execute on DAO structure, improve upon efficiency, and streamline DAO operations to be more consistent with traditional high functioning organization whilst exploring and implementing the benefits of the digitally native DAO organized on an open, permissionless blockchain. Formal proposal found here https://docs.google.com/document/d/1SasaVAasj6ElVIE9e2lLuofmOsyK4fsxkGHUEsA7ssk/edit?usp=sharing
account.name: BonkDAO x Glyn Jones

account.descriptionLink: Cupcake is a new social platform offering users a rotating feed of social mini games like “Would you rather?,” “Two Truths and a Lie,” “Caption the Meme,” and…now “Bonk Trivia”. Cupcake is building a high-engagement ecosystem made for both the crypto natives and the crypto curious to have fun on-chain. In this potential partnership with BONK, players can learn about the history, lore, and culture of BONK, climb the leaderboard, and win tokens & prizes.
account.name: BONK x Cupcake - Partnership Proposal

account.descriptionLink: BONK DAO is proposing a BURN of 278,393,137,215B BONK from its Treasury representing 100% of the BONK earned by BONK DAO from its revenue sharing agreement with BONKBot since launch. Reflecting a desire to increase community involvement in DAO decision making, any wallet with Bonk will be able to participate in the vote by depositing BONK for the duration of the vote (6 days), voting weight equal to its corresponding % of the total supply. You can withdraw all deposited BONK at the end of the vote.
account.name: Burn of BONK Token earned from BonkBot
